questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer performs a POST operation using REST API on the Cisco Nexus switch to retrieve a managed object, but the operation fails. Which configuration resolves the issue?

choices.C: Configure the correct subnet mask on Nexus7K-1.
choices.A: Configure preempt on one of the switches in the HSRP group.
choices.B: Configure the same HSRP priority between the two switches.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. HSRP adjacency fails to form between Nexus7K-1 and Nexus7K-2. Which action should be taken to solve the problem?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
hsrp 1 and 2 have different format, not compatible between them

- HSRP version 2 has a different packet format than HSRP version 1. The packet format uses a type-length-value (TLV) format. HSRP version 2 packets received by an HSRP version 1 device will have the type field mapped to the version field by HSRP version 1 and subsequently ignored.
- HSRP version 2 will not interoperate with HSRP version 1.

from : https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/ios-xml/ios/ipapp_fhrp/configuration/15-mt/fhp-15-mt-book/fhp-hsrp-v2.html

both switches configured "Preempt" 
in production env, we configure "Preempt" command to be elected for a primary device

choices.D: Modify the GET command to reference the valid path for the managed object
choices.C: Remove primaryEncap="vlan-110" from the specific port path

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A customer reports that all Intra-EPG isolation stopped working within a bare-metal tenant. Postman is running on a machine to get information from the APIC in case of orchestration failure. Which action resolves the issue?

A network administrator adds several Cisco UCS C-Series servers to the existing Cisco UCS environment. Some of the servers fail to be discovered in Cisco UCS Manager. Which two actions resolve the issue? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: DE
upgrade storage controller would be better fit

choices.A: Enable fabric interconnect ports as appliance ports.
choices.B: Place the VIC card in the correct PCIe slot.
choices.D: Remove custom configurations from Cisco IMC.

discussion.content: I think is A because the operator cannot access the file created by admin one day before

comments.content: * operator cannot overwrite the file created by admin
